name: Hop for the Best
storyline:
Shamed, disowned and banished from toad village by his adoptive father Papa Toad, Forgy the frog has all but given up hope on living the creative and care-free life he has dreamed of since he was a tadpole.

Just as he hits rock bottom, hope is restored when he see’s what everyone told him was just a fairy-tale… The legendary rainbow butterfly that is said to make all a frog’s wildest dreams come true.

With hope for a better life restored, Forgy gives chase through a colorful and dangerous clay-style world to capture the butterfly and make his dreams and hopes for a better life come true.
summary:
Hop For The Best is an indie clay-style platformer game in which you play as Forgy, an adorable little frog chasing hope for a better life.

Sprint, roll, climb, dash, and hop through beautiful clay inspired worlds. With no way to attack and danger at every turn, all you can do is… Hop For The Best!

Hop For The Best Features four gameplay modes. Standard Mode, One-Life Mode, Kid’s Mode, and Challenge Mode.
